titleStmt.title: A true relation of the trauels of M. Bush, a gentleman who with his owne handes without any other mans helpe made a pynace, in which hee past by ayre, land, and water: from Lamborne, a place in Bark.shire, to the Custome house Key in London. 1607
titleStmt.author: Nixon, Anthony.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] P[urfoot] for Nathaniel Butter,

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" signed: A.N., i.e. Anthony Nixon.
Running title reads: William Bush his trauels by aire, land, and water.
A variant of the edition with title: A true relation of the admirable voiage and travell of William Bush gentleman.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
